original_text: All that are born of the country shall do these things after this manner, in offering an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord.
korean_text: 누구든지 본토 소생이 여호와께 향기로운 화제를 드릴 때에는 이 법대로 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: All that are born of the country
shall do these things after this manner
sentences.korean_translation: 이러한 방식으로 이 일들을 행해야 하며

sentences.original_text: in offering an offering made by fire
of a sweet savour unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 주께 향기로운 향기로 드리는 제물이 되게 하라
